TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LoginCancelEventHandler(object sender, LoginCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed LoginCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub LoginCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As LoginCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void LoginCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, LoginCancelEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理可取消事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles a cancelable event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的方法，如处理的可取消的事件，事件，或事件。The class represents the method that handles the cancelable events, such as the event, or the event. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
